message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $115. I think it's a fair price considering its value.
I appreciate your time and consideration, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $90 is too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $105?
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Can we go any lower than that?
